comments: Lillard (POR) makes clean contact with the ball on his swipe during Butler's (MIA) shot attempt.
Lowry (MIA) does not establish himself in Simons' (POR) path when body contact occurs on the driving shot attempt.
Simons (POR) moves alongside Butler's (MIA) path and marginal contact occurs during his drive toward the rim.
Winslow (POR) jumps with vertical arms when marginal contact occurs with Butler (MIA) at the end of his drive toward the rim.
Winslow (POR) delivers contact to Vincent's (MIA) arm during his shot attempt.
Strus (MIA) extends his arm into Lillard's (POR) space and delivers contact to Lillard's arm as he starts his upward shooting motion.
Butler (MIA) and Simons (POR) mutually engage and disengage as Butler is posting up for the ball.
Winslow (POR) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Butler (MIA) goes to, not through, Simons (POR) during his drive toward the rim.
Winslow (POR) is drawn into the air as he jumps from point A to point B into Butler (MIA) during his upward shooting motion.
Lowry (MIA) moves alongside Lillard's (POR) path and marginal contact occurs during his drive toward the rim.
Hart (POR) is firming up when marginal contact occurs with Vincent (MIA) during the pick.
Simons (POR) and Butler (MIA) mutually engage and disengage off-ball.
Simons (POR) moves alongside Butler's (MIA) path and maintains a legal guarding position while contesting Butler's shot attempt.
Lillard (POR) is the last to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Simons (POR) and Strus (MIA) mutually engage and disengage off-ball.
Hart (POR) is the last to touch the ball before it rolls out of bounds.
Simons (POR) is set in Martin's (MIA) path and marginal contact occurs during the screen attempt.

Replay review of the foul called on Simons (POR) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful. Simons moves alongside Adebayo's (MIA) path during his drive toward the rim, however, Adebayo hooks Simons' opposite hip and affects his ability to defend.
Lowry (MIA) commits a take foul on Simons (POR). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Adebayo (MIA) is absorbing the initial contact that occurs with Simons (POR) as they engage off-ball before marginal contact occurs as Simons attempts to move over the screen.
Simons (POR) maintains a legal vertical position while contesting Strus' (MIA) shot attempt.
Butler (MIA) moves alongside Lillard's (POR) path and marginal contact occurs as Lillard is dribbling the ball in transition.
Winslow (POR) is firming up when marginal contact occurs as he grazes Butler (MIA) on the pick.
Lowry (MIA) legally contests Hart's (POR) shot attempt.
